title: Senior Software Engineer (Backend)
description:
TL;DR

Senior Software Engineer (AI, PHP, NodeJS, Python): Designing and building scalable backend services and architecting new systems with an accent on performance, scalability, and AI integration for automating complex workflows. Focus on leveraging AI and LLMs to enhance user experience and developing intelligent features within a microservices architecture.

Location: Fully remote, work from anywhere globally, with optional expenses-paid trips to HQ for meetups.

Salary: ‚Ç¨42,000‚Äì‚Ç¨56,000 per year

Company

hirify.global is a shipping and fulfillment platform that helps merchants automate their entire shipping workflow, connecting with e-commerce platforms and multiple couriers.

What you will do

  • Design scalable systems and architect backend services.
  • Code and lead technical design, exploring creative AI applications.
  • Leverage AI and LLMs to automate workflows and enhance user experience.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional Product and Design teams.
  • Optimize for performance and scalability, handling millions of shipments monthly.
  • Build with quality and ensure comprehensive testing.

Requirements

  • 5+ years of experience in web development (full-stack or backend-heavy).
  • Strong knowledge of PHP (Laravel or similar); experience with NodeJS and Python is a plus.
  • Solid understanding of system design, clean architecture, and engineering trade-offs.
  • Fluent in English (written and spoken).
  • Problem-solver mindset and comfortable in a fast-paced, distributed team.
  • Experience working on SaaS products or platforms is highly valued.
  • Experience with AI/ML integration, LLMs, or intelligent automation is a strong plus.

Culture & Benefits

  • Continuous learning with a yearly learning budget and AI tools like GitHub Copilot.
  • Remote flexibility, encouraging knowledge-sharing and onsite meetups.
  • Clear career growth paths and structured goals with continuous feedback.
  • Perks include meal vouchers, no clock-in/out policy, and a one-time home office allowance.
  • Company welfare and mental healthcare.

Hiring process

  • Interview with the People & Culture team to assess cultural fit.
  • High-level technical interview with a Team Leader.
  • Technical skills assessment, including a practical live coding challenge.

title: PHP Software Developer (Laravel)
description:
TL;DR

PHP Software Developer (Laravel): Developing and maintaining high-quality, scalable, secure, and user-friendly web applications with an accent on integrating user-facing elements and third-party services. Focus on optimizing application performance, scalability, and security, while adhering to best practices and participating in continuous improvement.

Location: Remote within Poland or onsite in Wroc≈Çaw, Poland

Company

hirify.global is a fast-growing, no-code SaaS software provider focused on digitalising the insurance industry with a global reach.

What you will do

  • Develop, test, and maintain web applications using PHP and Laravel.
  • Collaborate with front-end developers to integrate user-facing elements.
  • Design and implement RESTful APIs and ensure seamless integration with third-party services.
  • Optimize application performance, scalability, and security.
  • Participate in code reviews and contribute to a culture of continuous improvement.
  • Write clean, well-documented, and efficient code following best practices.

Requirements

  • 3+ years of experience in PHP development, with a strong focus on the Laravel framework.
  • Proficiency in front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
  • Experience with SQL databases, particularly MySQL or PostgreSQL.
  • Familiarity with version control systems, especially Git.
  • Understanding of MVC architecture and OOP principles.
  • Experience with unit testing and debugging.
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  • Strong communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.
  • English: Fluent skills required.

Culture & Benefits

  • Flexible working time and working place.
  • Health insurance or sports compensation.
  • Flat organizational structure without rigid hierarchies.
  • Friendly colleagues and supportive managers.
  • Family- and employee-friendly employer.
  • Opportunity to be part of the innovation wave hitting the insurance market.

title: Senior Fullstack PHP Engineer (PHP)
description:
TL;DR

Senior Fullstack PHP Engineer (PHP): Designing, developing, and maintaining robust, secure, and performant software at scale for a global open-source web analytics platform with an accent on architectural improvements and navigating complex codebases. Focus on solving tough technical problems, ensuring code quality, and contributing to scalable, privacy-first solutions.

Location: The engineering team is fully remote and distributed across Europe and other global hubs.

Company

hirify.global is a fast-growing and diverse IT and engineering nearshore solutions provider, assembling cross-border IT and engineering teams for global customers since 2007.

What you will do

  • Design, develop, and maintain robust, secure, and performant software at scale.
  • Solve complex technical problems and contribute to architectural improvements.
  • Navigate and contribute to a mature, complex codebase and improve it.
  • Write clean, well-tested, and maintainable code.
  • Share your expertise through code reviews, pairing, and mentoring.

Requirements

  • 8+ years‚Äô experience in software engineering, including full-stack development.
  • Highly competent in PHP and JavaScript, comfortable diving deep into a large legacy codebase.
  • Bring a structured approach to solving complex problems and thrive in systems with many moving parts.
  • Passionate about building products and ensuring your work has real impact.
  • Thoughtful, pragmatic, and deeply care about quality, user experience, and craftsmanship.
  • Collaborate with humility, communicate clearly, and enjoy learning from others as much as teaching.
  • Sure-footed in a remote environment, able to build effective working relationships globally.

Nice to have

  • Experience with Vue.js or modern JS frameworks.
  • Familiarity with large-scale open-source systems.
  • Contributions to community projects or mentoring others.
  • Comfort with Linux CLI, databases (MySQL), and Git/GitHub workflows.

Culture & Benefits

  • Great work-life balance.
  • Competitive remuneration package.
  • Exceptional social package & special discounts.
  • Supplemental health & dental care.
  • Team bonding events.
  • Excellent office location & facilities (for hirify.global staff).
  • Relaxing & gaming areas, free bike parking & showers.

title: Fullstack PHP Engineer (PHP)
description:
TL;DR

Fullstack PHP Engineer (PHP): Designing, developing, and maintaining robust and performant software for a globally recognized open-source web analytics platform with an accent on architectural improvements, scalability, and privacy-first solutions. Focus on tackling complex, large-scale challenges, contributing to a mature codebase, and shaping engineering standards.

Location: The engineering team is fully remote and distributed across Europe and other global hubs. You are able to build effective working relationships with people on the other side of the world.

Company

hirify.global provides premium IT and engineering nearshore solutions to global customers, specializing in assembling cross-border IT and engineering teams.

What you will do

  • Design, develop, and maintain robust, secure, and performant software at scale.
  • Solve tough, technical problems related to performance bottlenecks and architectural improvements.
  • Navigate and contribute to a mature, complex codebase, leaving it better than found.
  • Write clean, well-tested, maintainable code.
  • Share expertise through code reviews, pairing, and mentoring.

Requirements

  • 3+ years‚Äô experience in software engineering, including full-stack development.
  • Highly competent in PHP and JavaScript, comfortable diving into large legacy codebases.
  • Structured approach to solving complex problems in systems with many moving parts.
  • Passion for building products and making a real impact.
  • Thoughtful, pragmatic, and deeply caring about quality, user experience, and craftsmanship.
  • Collaborate with humility, communicate clearly, and enjoy learning from and teaching others.
  • Sure-footed in a remote environment, able to build effective working relationships with a global team.

Nice to have

  • Experience with Vue.js or modern JS frameworks.
  • Familiarity with large-scale open-source systems.
  • Contributions to community projects or mentoring others.
  • Comfort with Linux CLI, databases (MySQL), and Git/GitHub workflows.

Culture & Benefits

  • Great work-life balance.
  • Competitive remuneration package.
  • Exceptional social package & special discounts.
  • Supplemental health & dental care.
  • Team bonding events.
  • Excellent office location & facilities (in Eastern Europe).
  • Relaxing & gaming areas.
  • Free bike parking & showers.
